column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: Two foreign men in a modern ------Audi------ crashed in the early hours of on November 17
column5: in the front of the university along Monivong and corner of 96.------According to the source
column7: was traveling along Monivong Boulevard at very high speed.------A motorcycle was turning from Street 96 and the car swerved to avoid a collision and took out a street pole. Nobody was injured in the incident.------After the incident
column8: local authorities came down to the scene and took the high end motor to the Traffic Police Office of the Phnom Penh Police Commissariat to wait for resolution.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/387656
